snippet: If verified, the use of chemical agents could increase pressure on the Obama administration to intervene in the war more forcefully.
abstract: United States officials say Islamic State group is suspected of having used chemical weapons in attack on Kurdish fighters in Syria's north; Pentagon says it is also investigating report that group used mustard gas in attack on Kurdish fighters in Makhmur, Iraq.
lead_paragraph: If verified, the use of chemical agents could increase pressure on the Obama administration to intervene in the war more forcefully.

headline.main: ISIS Is Suspected of a Chemical Attack Against Kurds in Syria
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Is Suspected of Using Gas Against Kurds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
